A flat bean has 2 halves of a coffee bean in a cherry, while a peaberry is 1 round oval bean. A peaberry coffee tends to be surprisingly acidic with an intense flavor. The round shape gives it a more even roast. Check out our selection of peaberry coffees. Try a different origin, make notes ...
